name: Dimension Runner (MachiTeaStudios)
description:
Welcome to dimension Runner!

Dimension Runner is a first person bunny hopping platformer.  Take your character and proceed through the stages to finish the program game!

I am the only dev on MachiTeaStudios so if you have any questions or quality control let me know! I created this game as my summer project. I wanted to finish a game, so I did. I modeled the enemies,  created the levels,  music (not sfx), and coded for the entire game. The game is not perfect but I hope you can enjoy!
